name: PlanetSide 2 - Nanite Systems Operatives
notes: Does not work because of anti-cheat.

task.description: Installing the game When installing DirectX9 press cancel. Exit the launcher to finish install
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: https://launch.daybreakgames.com/installer/PS2_setup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/Public/Daybreak Game Company/Installed Games/PlanetSide
    2/LaunchPad.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX9 D3D v43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX9 D3D v43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: ' Installing the game When installing DirectX9 press cancel. Exit
      the launcher to finish install'
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
